actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, as amended, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to include among the purposes for which funds may be appropriated from the Land and Water Conservation Fund the restoration and improvement of units of the National Park System, the National Forest System, the National Wildlife Refuge System, and authorized areas administered by the Bureau of Land Management.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965, as amended, and for other purposes.
